questions.face_drooping: Is one side of the face drooping or numb?
questions.arm_weakness: Is one arm weak or numb? Can both arms be raised equally?
questions.speech_difficulty: Is speech slurred or hard to understand?
questions.onset_time: When did these symptoms start? (exact time is critical)
questions.other_symptoms: Are there vision changes, dizziness, severe headache, or confusion?
questions.medical_history: History of high blood pressure, atrial fibrillation, or previous stroke?

triage_rules.expression: ('yes' in str(face_drooping).lower() or 'yes' in str(arm_weakness).lower() or 'yes' in str(speech_difficulty).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Positive FAST test - Possible Stroke - Call 911 Immediately - Time is Brain
